welcome_message_body: Welcome to Waukegan! This charming city is known for its beautiful lakefront, historic sites, and vibrant arts scene. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Waukegan has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at O'hare International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving flights from over 60 international airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.
